hole_1.original_tactic:
apply Finset.prod_eq_zero (Finset.mem_univ (⟨0, npos⟩ : Fin n))
simpa using h ⟨0, npos⟩

hole_3.error_message: Tactic status: Incomplete: open goals remain, goals remain: 1
hole_3.original_tactic:
obtain ⟨k, hk⟩ := h₁
use 1
use fun _ => (∏ i : Fin n, x i : ℚ) / (x k : ℚ) ^ n
use fun i j => if (j = k) then 1 else 0
constructor
rw [havals]
intro i j
simp [Fin.ext_iff]
aesop
